resources.string: This is a temporaray activity so that we can all have our section to work with without depending on someone elses section to vist our own when testing. The reason for this is that lets say we didnt do this it would mean everyone would need depend on someone elses screen to get to theirs when testing so if theyre making changes and lets say they remove their buttons then another person wont be able to get to their section because their are no buttons to get to it. (e.g, the sign in button stops working in the sign in page which is the first page, everyone else working on the main menu/report forms/settings etc would be stuck and unable to test). Once we have all finished as much as we can without depending on each other we'll link it all together and put pages we're they're supposed to be.
